Uses of Class
chess.ChessMatch

Packages that use ChessMatch
Package Description
application  
chess.pieces
the package chess.pieces will contain the classes that will represent each type of chess piece.

  • Uses of ChessMatch in application

    Methods in application with parameters of type ChessMatch
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void UI.printMatch​(ChessMatch chessMatch, java.util.List<ChessPiece> captured)
    It will print the board through the UI.printBoard(ChessPiece[][]) method, the indicator of the pieces captured through the UI.printCapturedPieces(List) method and if there has not been a checkmate (and this will be checked using getCheckMate()) it will print respectively through the getTurn() and getCheck() methods, a message that will say which player is the current turn and also warn if there is a check.

  • Uses of ChessMatch in chess.pieces

    Fields in chess.pieces declared as ChessMatch
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private ChessMatch King.chessMatch  
    private ChessMatch Pawn.chessMatch  
    Constructors in chess.pieces with parameters of type ChessMatch
    Constructor Description
    King​(Board board, Color color, ChessMatch chessMatch)
    creates the king chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color besides having an dependency with a chess match
    Pawn​(Board board, Color color, ChessMatch chessMatch)
    creates the pawn chess piece, which is associated with a board and has a color besides having an dependency with a chess match
